title: Dog Sniffs Out Illegally Caught Fish
teaser: A Labrador Retriever named Saydee recently completed training, and now she's able to detect illegally caught fish. She made her for bust: 2 men in Bridgeport, Ct., had taken undersized striped bass.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
